modName: calyps open dragonpriest masks Skyre Mage Armor Fix
summary: a fix for Open Dragon Priest Masks by Calyps to make the Mage Armor perk work again
descriptionHtml:
this is a mod for the "Open Dragon Priest Masks by Calyps - ODPM (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17707/?)" mod for the Skyre version to make the Mage Armor perk work again by removing the Armor Light or Heavy keywords. on the momend it is only for the 00 skyre - Open Dragon Priest Mask - Variant 1, and it will make the masks armorless, so that it isn't unballanst, i will add files for the other versions if people are interested.
if anyone finds a bug(i don't know what coul'd go wrong) tell me in the commands or PM me
author: vinx909

files.name: Skyre Mage Armor Fix for ODPM
files.fileName: Skyre Mage Armor Fix for ODPM-59718-1-1.7z
